functions: Escalate misaligned props to POST-MORTEM or ROUTER
Tag suppressed props for backtest if volatility flags triggered
Route high-noise props to suppression logs

escalation_rules: Props with dual overlay conflict routed to POST-MORTEM
Low EV props flagged for memory discard

description: Cross-sport overlay suppression node. Filters noise, flags misalignment, routes suppression-worthy props for audit or discard.
